title: Ukraine will hold elections only when security situation allows
summary_full: Citing unnamed sources, the Financial Times had earlier reported Ukraine was mulling the possibility of holding a presidential election within the next three months under US pressure
summary_public: Citing unnamed sources, the Financial Times had earlier reported Ukraine was mulling the possibility of holding a presidential election within the next three months under US pressure

UA.label: positive
UA.evidence: Ukraine will hold elections only when security situation allows
